errors.dragonTooYoung: Selected dragon is not mature enough
errors.natureMismatch: Selected dragon ha a non-matching nature

dragon.adoptDragonTilte: Who are you fated to encounter?
dragon.adoptDragonHint: Open a door on a new adventure throughout lands and skies of Nightwood
dragon.chooseDragonName: Choose a name for your dragon
dragon.adoptSuccess: You have adopted a new dragon!
dragon.strengthHint: Strength has impact on the dragon's physical capabilities
dragon.dexterityHint: Dexterity has impact on the dragon's ability to move quickly
dragon.enduranceHint: Endurance has impact on the dragon's ability to withstand attacks
dragon.willHint: Will has impact on the dragon's magical abilities
dragon.luckHint: Luck has impact on critical strikes and exploration success
dragon.releaseMessage: Do you really ant to release your dragon? This decision is permanent.
dragon.chooseFoodHint: The choice of a meal can influence the development of dragon attributes
dragon.feedSuccessHint: Stamina restored, some attributes have changed

dragonSkills.InnerFlowHint: Increases maximum mana and mana regenerations
dragonSkills.RoughSkinHint: Reflect part of the received damage back to the attacker

auctions.durationHint: Auction must last from {{ min }} to {{ max }} houts
auctions.quantityHint: Quantity must be between {{ min }} and {{ max }} pieces
auctions.priceHint: Price must be between {{ min }} and {{ max }} gold
auctions.name: Name
auctions.confirmPurchaseMessage: Buy {{ quantity }} {{ name }} for {{ gold }} gold.

explore.startExpeditionShort: This is a relatively short trip that usually takes around three hours and requires dragon to have at least [{{ level }}] maturity level.
explore.startExpeditionMedium: This is a typical expedition that usually takes around six hours and requires dragon to have at least [{{ level }}] maturity level.
explore.startExpeditionLong: This is a long and arduous journey that usually takes around twelve hours and requires dragon to have at least [{{ level }}] maturity level.
explore.expeditionStartedHint: Your dragon will be busy for a while
explore.expeditionReportDescription: {{ dragon }} finished exploring the {{ expedition }} gained {{ experience }} experience and found:

expeditions.AndrewForestHint: Desipe the first impression it is a suprisingly calm and warm place, ideal for young dragons. The forest is protected by Andrew, a legendary dragon who has been guarding the forest since the great migration.
expeditions.RangaSandsHint: A faraway land, covered with sand and rocks where the wind is strong and the temperature is scorching. The desert is a place of great danger, but it is also a place of great treasure.
expeditions.HarnaPeaksHint: Mysterious and unexplored place filled with magical particles. Exploration requires an exceptional amount of power therefore it is accessible only for matured dragons.
